title: Has Shaclone quit league?
body:
I don't watch his streams but last video I saw he was complaining about the changes to the jungle and shaco and said was too annoyed to keep playing the game.

What's his current Lol status?

replies.body: Hopefully its just a break to relax and clear his head since the end of the season seemed to be tilting him pretty hard.  I'm sure Overwatch is fun and a refreshing break for him but holy wow is it boring as sin to watch...

> [{quoted}](name=Selegun,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=q96FUuci,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-01T12:48:52.404+0000)
>
> Hopefully its just a break to relax and clear his head

He received a 14 day ban a few days ago for intentionally feeding on live stream.

I got to watch that happen.  Being a streamer I'm sure he felt obligated to keep playing but honestly he should have taken a break before that game and it didnt help he had an audience eager to egg him on during his hour of poor judgement.
He's a Shaco main on youtube.

O I see.. well if that's the case then YT might hold the answer XD

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D1KnvQlMS2A

as it says right there "Uninstalled"

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=q96FUuci,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-11-01T14:54:49.181+0000)
>
> O I see.. well if that's the case then YT might hold the answer XD
> 
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D1KnvQlMS2A
> 
> as it says right there "Uninstalled"

Riot Devs!

Killing off the player base... because why stop at Morde!
I know Riot posted that all the mini boxes getting 1-shot was a bug, so that's one fix that he might be waiting for. If I was in his shoes, I'd probably try and forget the rework for a while.
